title: 【命令方块】NB的村民商店（服务器可用）！不进来看会后悔一辈子！=====标题要长=====
txt_content: 本帖最后由 贰逼 于 2014-12-14 21:36 编辑 村民的用处很大!只需要一个命令方块就可以制作一个 【村民商店】 =========我是分割线========== 这条指令是我一个下午的成果！ 是不是感觉指令太长？没关系！ 请看下面!     ↓ 指令：/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:5},sell:{id:173,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:10},sell:{id:42,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:15},sell:{id:41,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:20},sell:{id:57,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:30},sell:{id:116,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:1},sell:{id:295,Count:8}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:1},sell:{id:338,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:1},sell:{id:391,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:1},sell:{id:392,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:1},sell:{id:351,Count:1,Damage:3}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:1},sell:{id:352,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:1},sell:{id:361,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:1},sell:{id:362,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:5},sell:{id:420,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:5},sell:{id:329,Count:1}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:61,Count:1},sell:{id:287,Count:1}}]}}复制代码 只需粘贴进命令方块里充能就OK了！ =========The End===========

replies.author: 凋零蛋
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content: pm101发过了，还有讲解的…lz这个就只有一串指令，召唤出的村民是什么样子都不说…

replies.author: Block-sb
replies.txt_content: 不解释一下,也不告诉别人弄出来是什么,其实一点都不NB,pm一年多前就做过了,不知道多简单

replies.author: Block-sb
replies.txt_content: 还有啊,命令方块那不叫充能,叫触发,是不一样的

replies.author: 西瓜太郎
replies.txt_content: 也不讲解一下新手看得懂吗
